Home.title: Your Path to a Better Smile

image.alt: Drs and team photo at Bovenizer & Baker Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: At your complimentary new-patient consultation you’ll receive x-rays, photos, and a thorough oral exam by Dr. Bo, Dr. Baker, or Dr. Keri. We’ll build a custom treatment plan with clear options and a timeframe, verify your insurance, and provide a financial quote so you know what to expect.

Schedule online or submit a virtual consult — no appointment required. Schedule a Free Consultation: https://www.bovbakerortho.com/schedule-a-free-consult/ | Email: frontdesk@bovbakerortho.com | Call: 919-234-5593

items.title: Community Focus

image.alt: 2020 Diamond Award

items.text: We’re rooted in Cary, Apex and Morrisville and give back locally through events, school partnerships, and community programs.

items.title: Advanced Technology

image.alt: Digital scanner and aligner technology

items.text: We use iTero 3D scanning, 3D-printed retainers, and low-dose 3D x-rays to plan efficient, comfortable care.

items.title: Conservative Treatment

image.alt: Orthodontic braces consultation

items.text: We favor conservative timing for pediatric starts, letting natural growth guide treatment when appropriate.

items.title: Patient Perks & Support

image.alt: Team and patient perks

items.text: Fresh-baked cookies, a coffee bar, the Patient Rewards Hub, and a warm, family-centered team make visits pleasant for all ages.

paragraphs.text: You've found a down-to-earth orthodontic office. Get to know your favorite trio of docs — friendly, experienced clinicians who make care personal and easy to understand.

image.alt: Dr. Bo headshot

paragraphs.text: From discreet clear aligners to efficient Damon bracket systems, we offer tailored options for children, teens, and adults.

Metal braces treatment

og_meta.title: Home - Bovenizer & Baker Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Bovenizer & Baker Orthodontics in Cary, NC offers complimentary new-patient consultations, Invisalign, Damon braces, 3D scanning, and convenient scheduling.

image.alt: Drs. Bovenizer & Baker group photo

paragraphs.text: You’ve found a down-to-earth orthodontic office. We create a patient experience built on listening closely, treating families with warmth, and delivering clear, practical care plans.

Our manifesto shapes everything we do: fun brings smiles, the little details matter, and quality is everything. We hire passionate people who love their work and build a family spirit so every patient feels welcome.

We offer modern treatment options and customize care to each person’s lifestyle, including Damon braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> when appropriate. Our goal is a comfortable, efficient process that fits your life.
Rooted in Cary and nearby communities, we give back locally, provide flexible scheduling, and focus on making orthodontics accessible so patients leave confident and ready to share their smiles.

image.alt: Dr. Bo headshot / portrait

paragraphs.text: Dr. Bo performs the new patient exam, reviews x-rays and photos, and produces a personalized treatment plan with a clear financial quote at the complimentary consultation.

image.alt: Dr. Bo headshot / portrait

paragraphs.text: Dr. Baker joins the clinical exams and custom treatment planning. She’s available at the free consultation to review options, from Damon braces to Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, and to discuss the financial estimate.

image.alt: Dr. Baker portrait

paragraphs.text: Dr. Keri is an integral part of the clinical team, providing new patient exams, shaping treatment plans, and supporting ongoing care throughout treatment.

image.alt: Dr. Keri portrait

paragraphs.text: We live and breathe in the Cary, Apex, and Morrisville areas. Embedding our roots here and giving back to our local community is important to us. Learn more on our Community Matters page.

image.alt: Community and outreach activities
Schedule CTA image - office interior and team

og_meta.title: About Us | Bovenizer & Baker Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about Bovenizer & Baker Orthodontics in Cary: complimentary consultations, modern treatment options, and a community-first approach to care.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at orthodontic front desk

paragraphs.text: At your complimentary new patient appointment you'll meet our team, receive X-rays and photos, and have a full oral exam with one of our doctors. We’ll outline personalized treatment options and an estimated timeline so you can make an informed decision.
We also provide a clear financial quote and verify insurance benefits during this visit, so you leave knowing your options and next steps for treatment.

image.alt: Parent and child at reception desk of orthodontic office

paragraphs.text: We know cost is a common question. At your free consultation we provide a detailed financial quote and verify your insurance benefits so you know what to expect.
Flexible payment plans are available and our treatment coordinator will work with you to find an option that fits your budget.

image.alt: Schedule CTA image - office interior and team

seo.page_title: Get Started | Bovenizer and Baker Orthodontics
seo.page_description: Start your free consultation with Bovenizer and Baker Orthodontics. Learn what to expect at your first visit and schedule your complimentary consultation today.
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, free consultation, new patient, financing, Bovenizer and Baker Orthodontics

og_meta.title: Get Started | Bovenizer and Baker Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your free consultation with Bovenizer and Baker Orthodontics. Learn what to expect at your first visit and schedule your complimentary consultation today.

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages at Lakeshore Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We are conservative with start times and advocate letting the natural growing process run its course first. After a diagnostic exam we’ll advise if early (phase I) treatment is appropriate and explain what to expect for growth guidance and simpler corrections.

image.alt: Young patient receiving early orthodontic intervention

paragraphs.text: More adults are choosing orthodontics to improve function and confidence. We offer treatment options tailored to adult lifestyles, outline realistic timelines, and provide financial guidance during your complimentary consultation.

image.alt: Adult patient receiving orthodontic treatment

paragraphs.text: We offer Damon metal and Damon clear braces as durable, efficient options for comprehensive tooth movement. Your provider will recommend the bracket type best matched to your goals and lifestyle; treatment includes periodic adjustments and hygiene checks.
A reliable, efficient system for complex tooth movement and high-force corrections, Damon metal braces are designed for durability and effective results.

image.alt: Dental Checkup with Braces

paragraphs.text: Clear ceramic brackets blend with tooth color for a less noticeable look while still delivering effective alignment for many adult and teen cases.

image.alt: Smiling Woman with Clear Aligner
Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Clear plastic aligners, including Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, are removable, discreet, and effective for many cases. During your consultation we’ll determine if aligners are appropriate and review expected wear-time, care, and compliance.
Aligners let you brush, floss, and eat without bracket restrictions while achieving controlled tooth movement with advanced 3D planning.

image.alt: Close-up of Invisalign aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: For complex jaw discrepancies we coordinate closely with oral and maxillofacial or ENT surgeons to plan combined surgical and orthodontic care. Pre-surgical orthodontics aligns the teeth, surgical teams adjust the jaws for function and balance, and we manage post-surgical finishing and retention.

Our team provides detailed planning, 3D imaging for surgical simulation, and step-by-step support through recovery so you understand timelines, risks, and expected improvements in bite and facial harmony.

image.alt: Orthodontic patient receiving orthognathic surgical consultation

paragraphs.text: Retainers keep your smile in place after active treatment. We provide clear retainers and removable or bonded options, and we explain a retention plan designed for long-term stability.
At completion we’ll review wear schedules, care tips, and what to do if a retainer is lost or damaged so your results last for years.

image.alt: Beautiful young Asian woman smiling and holding orthodontic retainer

paragraphs.text: We use modern digital tools to improve accuracy, comfort, and speed of care across diagnosis, treatment planning, and appliance fabrication.
No more gross putty impressions. Our iTero scanner captures comfortable, fast 3D images for precise planning and aligner design.

image.alt: iTero digital scanner in use during orthodontic consultation

paragraphs.text: We utilize in-house 3D printing to fabricate appliances and retainers for faster turnaround and consistent quality.

image.alt: 3D treatment planning software showing orthodontic simulation

paragraphs.text: Low-dose, high-detail 3D imaging supports complex diagnostics and surgical planning with clear visualization of jaws and airway structures.

image.alt: Digital X-ray equipment showing detailed orthodontic imaging
Modern dentist office interior with advanced technology
Schedule CTA image - office interior and team

og_meta.title: Contact Bovenizer & Baker Orthodontics | Cary Orthodontist
og_meta.description: Contact Bovenizer & Baker Orthodontics in Cary for a free consultation. Friendly, community-focused orthodontic care for kids and adults.

image.alt: Orthodontic team smiling together in a bright, modern clinic

paragraphs.text: Find quick answers to our most common patient questions about treatment options, timing, insurance/fees, appointments, and virtual consults. If you don’t see your question here, contact our front desk or schedule a free consult.

accordion.header: Do I need a referral to see an orthodontist?

paragraphs.text: No — most patients can schedule a consultation without a referral. For details about when to see an orthodontist and what to expect at your first visit, see our blog and patient resources: https://www.bovbakerortho.com/blog/do-i-need-a-referral-to-see-an-orthodontist/

image.alt: Orthodontic team portrait, friendly staff ready to greet patients

accordion.header: Braces vs. Invisalign<sup>®</sup> — which is right for me?

paragraphs.text: Both are excellent options; the best choice depends on your bite, alignment goals, and lifestyle. Our doctors will review options during your complimentary consult and recommend a personalized plan. Learn more: https://www.bovbakerortho.com/blog/braces-vs-invisalign/

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligners and orthodontic braces for comparison

accordion.header: What can I eat with Invisalign<sup>®</sup> or braces?

paragraphs.text: Invisalign<sup>®</sup> aligners are removable so you can eat normally, but you should wear aligners 20–22 hours per day and maintain good oral hygiene. With braces, avoid very hard or sticky foods to prevent damage. See our patient guidance articles for detailed lists and tips.

image.alt: Patient smiling after treatment, enjoying daily life with new smile

accordion.header: How much will treatment cost and do you accept insurance?

paragraphs.text: Cost varies with treatment complexity. At your complimentary new‑patient appointment you’ll receive a treatment plan and a detailed financial quote, including insurance verification. To schedule your visit, use our booking page: https://www.bovbakerortho.com/schedule-a-free-consult/

image.alt: Financial and insurance information document image

accordion.header: What happens right after braces are removed? Do I need a retainer?

paragraphs.text: Yes — retainers are typically required to keep teeth in their new positions. We’ll discuss retainer options, wear schedules, and aftercare at the time of removal so you leave with a clear plan to protect your smile.

image.alt: Smiling patient being fitted for a retainer by an orthodontic team member

accordion.header: How do I submit a Virtual Consult?

paragraphs.text: We offer a virtual consult option: take a few photos and submit them for a remote review so our doctors can give initial feedback. Details and submission steps are provided on the practice’s virtual consult resource pages.

image.alt: Patient preparing photos for a virtual orthodontic consult

accordion.header: What happens if a bracket or wire becomes loose?

paragraphs.text: Minor issues are common and can often be handled with a quick in‑office visit. Call the front desk at 919-234-5593 for guidance and to schedule a repair if needed. Our blog also covers common bracket and wire troubleshooting tips.

image.alt: Orthodontic team assisting a patient with minor braces adjustment
